    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205380</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Frontiers of Dance: Ledoh and Salt Farm Butoh Dance Company</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grenzen des Tanzes: Ledoh und Salt Farm 
Butoh Dance Company</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Frontières de danse : Ledoh et Salt Farm 
Butoh Dance Company</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fronteiras da dança: Ledoh e Sal Fazenda 
Butoh Dançar Companhia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frontiere del ballo: Ledoh e Salt Farm Butoh
Dance Company</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνορα του χορού: Ledoh και αλατισμένο 
αγρόκτημα Butoh Dance Company</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fronteras de la danza: Ledoh y Salt Farm 
Butoh Dance Company</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK goes into rehearsals with butoh dancer Ledoh, as he explores the ancient, agrarian roots of his Ka-Ren ancestry in Burma with his group The Salt Farm Butoh Dance Company. This Educator Guide traces the history of butoh to its origins in post-war Japan and its diverse contemporary forms.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN steigt in Wiederholungen mit butoh Tänzer 
Ledoh, da er das alte erforscht, landwirtschaftliche Wurzeln seines 
Ka-Ren Geschlechtes in Birma mit seinem gruppieren Salt Farm Butoh 
Dance Company ein. Diese Erzieher-Anleitung vollzieht die 
Geschichte von butoh zu seinen Ursprung in Nachkriegsjapan und zu 
seinen verschiedenen zeitgenössischen Formularen nach.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ÉTINCELLE entre dans des répétitions avec le 
danseur Ledoh de butoh, car il explore l'antique, les racines agraires
de sa ascendance de Ka-Ren en Birmanie avec le sien groupent Salt Farm
Butoh Dance Company. Ce guide d'éducateur trace l'histoire du 
butoh à ses origines au Japon d'après-guerre et à ses formes 
contemporaines diverses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A FAÍSCA entra em rehearsals com dancer Ledoh do 
butoh, porque explora o antigo, raizes agrarian de seu ancestry do 
ka-Ren-Ren em Burma com his agrupa o Sal Fazenda Butoh Dançar 
Companhia. Esta guia do educador segue o history do butoh a suas
origens em Japão post-war e a seus formulários contemporary 
diversos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La SCINTILLA entra nelle ripetizioni con il 
ballerino Ledoh del butoh, poichè esplora l'antico, radici agrarie
della sua ascendenza del Ka-Ren in Birmania con suo raggruppa il Salt 
Farm Butoh Dance Company. Questa guida dell'educatore segue la 
storia di butoh alle relative origini nel Giappone del dopoguerra ed 
alle relative forme contemporanee varie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΑΣ πηγαίνει στις πρόβες με το χορευτή Ledoh
butoh, δεδομένου ότι ερευνά τις αρχαίες, αγροτικές ρίζες της 
καταγωγής της Karen του στη Βιρμανία με την ομάδα του το 
αλατισμένο αγρόκτημα Butoh Dance Company. Αυτός ο 
οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών επισημαίνει την ιστορία του butoh στην 
προέλευσή του στη μεταπολεμική Ιαπωνία και τις διαφορετικές 
σύγχρονες μορφές του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La CHISPA entra ensayos con el bailarín Ledoh del
butoh, como él explora el antiguo, las raíces agrarias de su 
ascendencia de Ka-Ren en Birmania con el suyo agrupa la Salt Farm 
Butoh Dance Company. Esta guía del educador rastrea la historia
del butoh a sus orígenes en Japón de la posguerra y a sus formas 
contemporáneas diversas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
